text:
must feature in any Sure Start 
programme are:
• outreach and home visiting 
services, to make contact 
as early as possible in the 
child’s life and draw families 
into using other services;
• family support, including 
befriending, social support 
and parenting information,  
both group and home-
based;
• good quality play, learning 
and childcare experiences 
for children, both group 
and home-based;
• primary and community 
healthcare and advice;
